instructions.en: Cook grated cauliflower and butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat until light golden brown, about 8 minutes
instructions.sk: Varte nastrúhaný karfiol a maslo na veľkej panvici na stredne vysokom ohni, kým nezíska svetlohnedú farbu, asi 8 minút
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで中高温で、おろしたカリフラワーとバターを薄い金色になるまで約8分間調理する

instructions.en: Add heavy cream, salt, pepper, and optional nutmeg to the skillet
instructions.sk: Pridajte do panvice smotanu na šľahanie, soľ, korenie a voliteľne muškátový oriešok
instructions.ja: フライパンに生クリーム、塩、コショウ、お好みでナツメグを加える

instructions.en: Bring to a simmer and cook uncovered until cream has reduced and thickened, about 3-5 minutes
instructions.sk: Priveďte do varu a varte nezakryté, kým sa smotana nezredukuje a nezhustne, asi 3-5 minút
instructions.ja: 沸騰させ、クリームが減って濃くなるまで蓋をせずに3〜5分ほど煮る

instructions.en: Stir in shredded Swiss cheese and cook over low heat until cheese has melted
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte strúhaný švajčiarsky syr a varte na miernom ohni, kým sa syr neroztopí
instructions.ja: シュレッドしたスイスチーズを加え、弱火でチーズが溶けるまで調理する
